modmenu.summaryTranslation.smart-copper-: Reworks the vanilla Copper Golem behavior and introduces deep memory support, making them smarter and more efficient.
screen.smart_copper_golem.config.title: Smart Copper Golem - Config
config.section.transport.title: Transport
config.section.transport.desc:
Item transport is a core ability of Copper Golems.

âœ” Copper Golems will attempt to open Barrels and Shulker Boxes.
âŒ The chest traversal limit has been removed.
config.transport.target_interaction_time:
Time spent inspecting a chest
Unit: ticks
config.transport.max_stack_size.label: Maximum Pickup Amount
config.transport.max_stack_size.tooltip:
Maximum number of items transported per trip
Unit: items

ðŸ’¬ This option cannot exceed the in-game stack size limit.
config.transport.match_mode.label: Item Matching Mode
config.transport.match_mode.tooltip:
> Exact Match:
Matches item types and their attributes (Durability, Enchantment, Naming, etc.).
> Item Match:
Matches only item types.
> Category Match:
Matches similar items in addition to matching item types (such as different colored Wool, different types of Planks, etc.)
config.section.pathfinding.title: Pathfinding
config.section.pathfinding.desc:
Pathfinding is a core ability of Copper Golems.

âœ” Reworks vanilla pathfinding logic, greatly improving target reach success rate.
config.pathfinding.horizontal_search_dis:
Far enough to scan for target chests horizontally
Unit: blocks
config.pathfinding.vertical_search_dista:
Far enough to scan for target chests vertically
Unit: blocks
config.pathfinding.horizontal_interactio:
Far enough to open target chests horizontally
Unit: blocks

ðŸ’¬ Increasing interaction distance will cause pathfinding calculations to increase exponentially!
config.pathfinding.vertical_interaction_:
Far enough to open target chests vertically
Unit: blocks

ðŸ’¬ Increasing interaction distance will cause pathfinding calculations to increase exponentially!
config.section.memory.title: Deep Memory
config.section.memory.desc:
Deep Memory can help Copper Golems transport items with purpose and greatly improve transportation efficiency.

âœ” Copper Golems will prioritize transporting target items recorded in memory.
âœ” When two Copper Golems meet, they will exchange the latest memory information.
âœ” If an item cannot be placed in any Chest, it will be sent back to the Copper Chest and temporarily ignored.
âœ” Copper Golems will gradually forget Chests that have not been visited for a long time.
config.memory.blacklist_duration.label: Item Ignore Duration
config.memory.blacklist_duration.tooltip:
Undeliverable items will be returned to the Copper Chest and ignored for a period of time
Unit: ticks
config.memory.chest_expiration.label: Memory Retention Duration
config.memory.chest_expiration.tooltip:
Chest-related memory entries will be cleared after a period of time
Unit: ticks
config.memory.sync_cooldown.label: Memory Sync Cooldown
config.memory.sync_cooldown.tooltip:
After a successful memory exchange, syncing will be paused for a period of time
Unit: ticks

ðŸ’¬ Reducing the cooldown may cause performance issues due to frequent syncing.
config.memory.sync_distance.label: Memory Sync Trigger Distance
config.memory.sync_distance.tooltip:
The distance at which two Copper Golems meet to trigger memory exchange
Unit: blocks
config.error.min_interaction_time: Interaction time must be at least 10 ticks
config.error.min_horizontal_interaction_: Horizontal Interaction Distance must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_horizontal_interaction_: Horizontal Interaction Distance must be at most 5 blocks
config.error.min_vertical_interaction_di: Vertical Interaction Distance must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_vertical_interaction_di: Vertical Interaction Distance must be at most 10 blocks
config.error.min_horizontal_search_dista: Horizontal Search Distance must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_horizontal_search_dista: Horizontal Search Distance must be at most 256 blocks
config.error.min_vertical_search_distanc: Vertical Search Distance must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_vertical_search_distanc: Vertical Search Distance must be at most 128 blocks
config.error.min_blacklist_duration: Ignore Duration must be at least 0 ticks
config.error.min_chest_memory: Chest Memory Duration must be at least 1 tick
config.error.min_sync_distance: Sync Distance must be at least 0.5 blocks
config.dialog.discard.title: Discard Changes
config.dialog.discard.message: Discard unsaved changes? This action cannot be undone.
config.dialog.save.title: Save
config.dialog.reset.title: Reset
